thread.title: Vin Diesel`s `sweet` b'day wish to mom
thread.title_full: Vin Diesel`s `sweet` b'day wish to mom

title: Vin Diesel`s `sweet` b'day wish to mom
text: Vin Diesel`s `sweet` b'day wish to mom Saturday, 24 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) * Washington D.C., Oct.24 (ANI): Vin Diesel has definitely made his mother's birthday memorable with his sweet birthday wish.* Washington D.C., Oct.24 (ANI): Vin Diesel has definitely made his mother's birthday memorable with his sweet birthday wish. The 48-year-old actor shared a pic on his mother Delora Vincent's Instagram page and captioned it as, "Happy Birthday to the most wonderful woman I have ever known, my mother. I love you mom, "People Magazine reports. The 'XXX' actor continued, "She wants me to take her to see the Last Witch Hunter tonight. Haha." The sweet snap shows Delora sitting beside the 'Fast and Furious' actress Gal Gadot. (ANI)
